tool_description: An API showing Ukraine news from 54 news sites from all over the world
name: Ukraine News Live
title: Ukraine News Live

api_list.name: Get Ukraine News Form Source
api_list.description: Get Ukraine news from specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/ukraine/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com/ukraine/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-news-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Ukraine News
